## Getting Started

## Installing and loading the required libraries


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(readtext, quanteda, tidytext,  tidyverse)
```
:::


### Data import and preparation (Text)

For the purpose of this exercise, data from MC1 of Vast CGallenge 2024 will be used.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
text_data <- readtext(paste0("data/articles", "/*"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
usenet_words <- text_data %>%
  unnest_tokens(word,text) %>%
  filter(str_detect(word, "[a-z']$"),
         !word %in% stop_words$word)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
usenet_words %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE)
```
